en.contents:
You have briefly seen what The Suite is all about in Sentre Protocol’s updated Roadmap. Now, look closely into what they bring to the table.

InterDAO - Your decentralized manager

Post-launch management is hard, persuading the mass about your strategies and roadmap is even harder.

“How can I manage my project & fund in a decentralized way?”


InterDAO is the best customizable DAO tool on Solana, which helps create and manage your own DAO with ease.

It offers multiple frameworks & voting mechanisms (staking, locking, voting with NFT), allows automated proposal execution, and has a revenue sharing policy reserved for DAO owners only.

InterDAO is a set of customizable DAO solutions with multiple mechanisms that fit your project’s situation perfectly. A flexible amount of DAO types that is customized for any purpose. On top of that, special features born for NFT DAOs are ready at the tip of your fingers.

InterDAO will be your go-to solution for a seamless, decentralized management system, that satisfies both the project and its community with transparency and ease of access.

Try InterDAO here: (TBA)

Balansol - Your customizable fund leverage

“How can I kick off a pair of token with low funds yet still bring a good bonding curve?”


By allowing pool owners to use up to 8 types of tokens and customize the weight of each type in their pool, Balansol creates a never-before-seen path on the Solana ecosystem. Projects can now take full advantage of their fund and bootstrap their liquidity to the max, with less capital than they can imagine.

Build the ecosystem of your dream. Create perfect launchpads for your project while keeping bots away with the liquidity bootstrapping pool model. Gather your favorite top tokens and make index funds for your users.

Try Balansol here: https://hub.sentre.io/app/balansol?autoInstall=true

Lightning Tunnel - Your one-click, one-fee airdrop tool

Marketing campaigns can be a big pain in the wallet of the projects. Prior to all the IDOs and token launches, you have to try your best to spread your tokens to as many people as possible. Traditional activities include airdrops, whitelists, prelaunch campaigns, and so on. As more effort is poured into spreading the tokens, more fees and time will be lost on delivering the treats to the winners.

“How can I do token vesting, mega airdrops, etc. painlessly?”


Lightning Tunnel is a bulk transaction tool that helps you do unlimited airdrops with less than 1$.

Stop wasting time signing airdrop transactions. With Lightning Tunnel, you can set automatic and customizable distribution schedules. One sign, one time fee, and superspeed!

Try Lightning Tunnel here: https://hub.sentre.io/app/lightning_tunnel?autoInstall=true

Sen Booster - Your bond offering service (coming soon)

“How can I boost my pool’s TVL?”


Sen Booster is a bonding solution that makes bootstrapping liquidity a piece of cake.

With super low fees and zero slippage, you can slow down the inflation speed, and raise your TVL in a safe and fair way on both ends.

Using a classic buyback model inspired by how bonds work, Sen Booster slows down the inflation speed for projects. As more users lock tokens for a bargain buyback, the projects will undoubtedly be able to protect, if not raise, their TVL in a safe and fair way on both ends.

Try Sen Booster here: (TBA)

Messup - Your privacy layer (coming soon)

Sometimes there will be information that needs to stay away from privy eyes. Imagine your project making a deal with a certain DEX to be listed, then having that transaction visible, open for anyone to see after.

How can said project ever get a better deal? This calls for a private payout option, and Messup is here to save your day.

“How can I do payout privately from my fundraising wallet?”


Messup is a layer on Solana, which helps protect the privacy of your transactions.

With a simple click, you can get high-level protection, hide the amount of your incoming/outgoing transactions, and choose your earning mechanism (TBC).

Try Messup here: (TBA)
en.title: Sen Suite - 5 Highly Customized Solutions To Solana Projects
